data.question: What is the chemical formula for TIFSIX-2-Ni-i?
data.answer: TIFSIX-2-Ni-i

data.question: What method was used for powder X-ray diffraction data collection?
data.answer: SHIMADZU XRD-6000 diffractometer

data.question: What is the temperature range used for thermogravimetric analysis?
What gas adsorption measurements were performed on the Micromeritics ASAP 2020?
data.answer: C2H2 and C2H4 gas adsorption measurements

data.question: What is the purpose of using the Quantum-Espresso package in the study?
data.answer: To perform dispersion-corrected density-functional theory (DFT-D) calculations

data.question: What is the significance of the breakthrough experiments conducted?
data.answer: To test the practical feasibility of TIFSIX-2-Ni-i for the C2H2/C2H4 separation

data.question: Is TIFSIX-2-Ni-i stable under humid conditions?
data.answer: Yes, TIFSIX-2-Ni-i is relatively stable under humid conditions

data.question: Does TIFSIX-2-Ni-i exhibit high acetylene storage capacity?
data.answer: Yes, TIFSIX-2-Ni-i exhibits high acetylene storage capacity

data.question: What is the role of the dual-site Langmuir-Freundlich equation in the study?
data.answer: It is used for fitting the single-component C2H2 and C2H4 adsorption isotherm data

data.question: What was the outcome of the accelerated stability measurements?
data.answer: TIFSIX-2-Ni-i maintained its structural integrity and surface area after exposure to humidity

data.question: What is the main advantage of TIFSIX-2-Ni-i in gas separation?
data.answer: TIFSIX-2-Ni-i has high selectivity and capacity for gas separation

data.question: What is the significance of the isosteric heat of adsorption calculated in the study?
data.answer: It reflects the binding energy of gases and helps understand the interaction strength between gas molecules and TIFSIX-2-Ni-i

data.question: What was the method used for SEM analysis?
data.answer: SEM analysis was performed using a SU 8000 scanning electron microscope

data.question: What was the main finding from the column breakthrough experiments?
data.answer: TIFSIX-2-Ni-i effectively separated C2H2 from C2H4 in a gas mixture

data.question: Is TIFSIX-2-Ni-i capable of high C2H2 uptake under ambient conditions?
data.answer: Yes, TIFSIX-2-Ni-i is capable of high C2H2 uptake under ambient conditions

data.question: What is the role of IAST calculations in the study?
data.answer: IAST calculations were used to predict binary mixture adsorption and calculate adsorption selectivity

data.question: What was the purpose of using the virial-type expression in the study?
data.answer: To calculate the enthalpies of adsorption for gases at different temperatures

data.question: What was the outcome of the accelerated stability measurements under humidity?
data.answer: TIFSIX-2-Ni-i showed no structure collapse or phase transition under humid conditions

data.question: What was the main conclusion of the study regarding TIFSIX-2-Ni-i?
data.answer: TIFSIX-2-Ni-i is a promising material for industrial gas separation with high selectivity and capacity

data.question: What was the significance of the DFT-D calculations in understanding gas adsorption?
data.answer: DFT-D calculations helped understand the detailed interactions between hydrocarbon gas molecules and TIFSIX-2-Ni-i
